name: Copy Kitty (itch)
description:
Boki can copy powers from enemies and then combine up to 3 at a time, with 175 combinations total! Blast your way through cyberspace while training to be a superhero!

• 12 worlds, with over 20 bosses
• Two playable characters with their own special abilities
• Endless Mode with 37 environments, and bosses with randomized attacks
• A level editor, to create and share your own missions
• Square watermelons that you can kick to smash them

Links:
• Discord server, to talk about the game and post cat pictures
• Entanma.com, for news and updates
• @AzureLazuline, for screenshots and gifs
